EmailTemplate.description: Copy of our invoice for your files
EmailTemplate.name: invoice copies for our dealers Cash
EmailTemplate.subject: Invoice copies for your records {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeedERP__Work_Order_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Account.Name}
Please find attached, a copy of our invoice(s) for your records.
This invoice(s) have received a cash discount for payment in advance.
If there are any questions or concerns please contact our Dealer Care Team.
Thank-you,
